summary: The module provides a command‑line interface for the Berkeley Function Call Leaderboard, coordinating environment setup, model selection, response generation, evaluation, and reporting of benchmark results and scores, while organizing execution commands into logical groups.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to benchmark and compare language models on function‑calling tasks through an easy‑to‑use CLI that automates the generation, evaluation, and presentation of results, facilitating transparent performance tracking and model improvement.
